info.title: Modules resource reader.
info.description: This class is used to allow modules to access resources either from the project either from the production.

method.name: get
method.description: Get a modules resource. This function will decide whether to load the resource from the project or from the published path.

parameter.name: $resourcePath
parameter.description: The resource subpath from the resource root folder down.

method.name: getURL
method.description: Get a resolved url pointing to a pages resource file.

parameter.name: $resourcePath
parameter.description: The resource subpath from the resource root folder down.

method.name: getPath
method.description: Get a pages resource path. This function will decide whether to get the resource path from the project or from the published path.

parameter.name: $resourcePath
parameter.description: The resource subpath from the resource root folder down.

parameter.name: $rootRelative
parameter.description: Indicates whether the path is system root relative or absolute. It is TRUE by default.
